name: Easy Skillet Sausage and Vegetables
author: Jessica Chrysam Wood
summary: Easy weeknight dish that makes an attractive presentation. Can be easily reheated for potluck events. Serve over rigatoni, rice, or with garlic bread.
ingredients: 1 pound hot Italian sausage links, cut into pieces
6 small bell peppers, cut into strips
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Cook and stir sausage in a skillet over medium heat until cooked through, 5 to 7 minutes, partially draining the drippings
Add bell peppers and zucchini to the sausage; cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes
Stir tomatoes, oil, chicken bouillon, salt, and pepper to sausage mixture; cook and stir until heated through, about 3 minutes
